subject: Re: Order #SSN2758, how did it go?
description_text:
Great, but I'm a little confused, the order said pedal and control box, but
I didn't receive a control box.

Thanks

On Sun, Oct 12, 2025, 2:26 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello John, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.

conversations.body_text: Hi John Schneible,    We apologize for any confusion caused. The control box must be purchased separately; it was simply listed under the same link as this clutch.

The clutch seems to work fine with my old control box. Thank you for
clarifying.

On Mon, Oct 13, 2025, 12:43 AM service@simsonn.com
